Description:
Supremely spacious design = family harmony
A superbly generous layout, family friendly locale and impeccable presentation ensure this five bedroom, three bathroom home a place at the top of the list. Comprising a living room flowing to a formal dining room, vast kitchen/meals/family, retreat, wide covered outdoor entertaining area and gardens, the home is ready to welcome a large family. You'll find everything from a gas cooktop to a fan forced oven, dishwasher, excellent counter space and cupboards in the kitchen. Bathrooms include two shining ensuites, each bedroom has a walk-in/built-in robe, and further features include a powder room, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, split system, laundry chute, great storage, rear ROW and double garage accessing Benny Lane. Schools, parks and transport are a stroll and Sydney Road nearby.
Insights: 1 Phillips Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 12 other 5 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Park Side Tranquillity
Space, tranquillity and contemporary style is what to expect from this park side single bedroom ‘Merriview Place’ apartment. In vogue, pale neutral hues contribute a feeling of openness and reflect abundant natural light. A spacious open living domain includes a well appointed stylish kitchen and extends to a superb balcony enjoying expansive park vistas. Sharing the full width balcony and view is the double bedroom, additionally enhanced with generous built-in wardrobes and a private ensuite boasting an oversized shower. There’s a separate guest powder room to service the living zone and a laundry. The home is securely accessed via video intercom and CCTV foyer surveillance whilst also being comforted by split system air conditioning. The car is secured via undercover parking and there’s also a handy storage cage. The complex boasts a glistening swimming pool and communal courtyard ideal for larger summer gatherings. Situated just moments to recreational facilities, it encourages a healthy outdoor lifestyle. It’s also close to public transport, Coburg Village and Sydney Road cafes. Currently leased until mid-October 2018 for $1,478 per calendar month, it presents an excellent return for investors. Alternatively, new buyers and downsizers will appreciate the pristine presentation, low maintenance upkeep and lifestyle advantages.
Features
- Spacious open plan living domain with stylish kitchen and large balcony with park vistas
- Double bedroom with BIRs and modern ensuite, sharing the balcony and views
- Great service also includes a powder room (second toilet) and laundry
- Undercover secure parking, split system air conditioning, video intercom, communal pool
- Close to Coburg Village, Sydney Road cafes and recreational facilities
- Leased until mid-October 2018 for $1,478 per calendar month
Insights: 303B/1 Manna Gum Court, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 26 other 1 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Timeless Edwardian Charm with Impressive Indoor/Outdoor Space
On an oversized single-front block of land (approx 377sqm), this freestanding period prize delivers a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle opportunity with its extended floorplan, quality enhancements and enviable inner-urban convenience. Beyond the gorgeous facade complete with return verandah, the home's elegant interior comprises three spacious bedrooms (two with BIRs), contemporary-style bathroom and separate WC. Add to this an expansive open-plan living/dining area and updated kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher. Other features include ducted heating and split-system a/c, lead-light windows, high ornate ceilings and solid timber floors. French doors from the living area reveal an expansive north-facing backyard with extensive brick paving, established perimeter gardens and secure off-street parking via ROW. In a prized location with easy access to the best of Coburg, it's close to local buses, trams and trains, shops and supermarkets, cafes and restaurants, as well as popular parks and primary schools.
Insights: 166 Munro Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Outstanding size, scope and a superb lifestyle location
A rare opportunity offered for the first time in 60+ years, this completely comfortable home on a 557 sqm allotment (approx.) with rear ROW extends an irresistible invitation to renovate/extend or rebuild (STCA). A warm and welcoming ambience that can only arise from decades of pride and enjoyment awaits eager buyers looking to add a stylish contemporary signature to this well-maintained and presented property including separate studio and double garage. Superbly situated near Sydney Road's lifestyle attractions, schools, Anderson Reserve and Moreland station, this instantly inviting home comprises 2 sizable bedrooms with BIRs, flowing living and dining room, immaculate kitchen, bright bathroom, laundry, gas heating, ceiling fans, ample storage, mature garden surroundings and 3 off street car spaces.

Description:
Prestigious living on 990m2 approx.
A landmark opportunity to acquire a prestigious home in Coburg's most exclusive boulevard presents itself in the form of this four bedroom plus study, two bathroom Californian Bungalow home. Proudly positioned on 990m2 (approx.), this outstanding home boasts elegant interiors resplendent with leadlight windows, ornate ceilings, fretwork and hardwood floors. Offering superb single level accommodation this attractive home boasts majestic formal dining with OFP, modern Fisher&Paykel appointed kitchen/meals, informal living, entertainer's deck and generous rear garden; all made comfortable with heating/cooling, video entry, alarm, double carport and lock-up shed. Prestigiously located for an enviable family lifestyle, it boasts Sydney Road, transport, schools and Merri Creek parklands nearby.

Description:
Charming Weatherboard with Huge Potential
A wonderful opportunity to renovate or extend (S.T.C.A) in a much sought-after part of Coburg.
With original and charming features including woodern floors & high ceilings, this character filled home is perfect for anyone looking to add a personal touch with minor or major improvements. With 3 generous bedrooms, central bathroom, study, kitchen, seperate dining area and laundry. With a large backyard, handy storage shed and only a short stroll to O'Hea Street bus line, Coburg North Primary School, Harmony Park, Coburg North Village Shopping Centre, as well as easy access to Batman Station and Sydney Road trams, this is a superb opportunity.
Inspection By Appoitnment - Enquire Today!
NB. Regarding indicated Price - Please understand, particularly on the more 'popular' properties or in a 'hot' property market that more than one buyer may be interested in the same property. When that happens, all buyers will be given EQUAL OPPORTUNITY TO MAKE THEIR BEST OFFERS.

Description:
Designer Living with Architectural Finesse
Defined by its spectacular renovations and impressive extension, this showpiece delivers a lifestyle of absolute quality, floorplan versatility and city-edge practicality. Beyond its captivating facade, the home's vogue interior boasts three large bedrooms (master with en-suite) and luxurious central bathroom, and light-filled open living/dining area complemented by a sleek designer kitchen with granite benchtops, breakfast bar and high-end cooking appliances. Other stand-out features include split-system a/c throughout, hardwood floors plus an entertainers deck leading out to a delightful back garden with garage accessed via Moore Street. In a prime location with the best of Coburg at your fingertips, stroll to local cafes and numerous parks, Sydney Road shops and restaurants, as well as Moreland Station and a choice of tram lines to hospital/university precincts and the CBD. Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 28A Campbell Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2017 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Hard To Go Past
This impeccably presented two bedroom home has been devotedly maintained by one family for over fifty years located on a corner allotment with rear right of way. Generous open plan living spaces, including vast family and dining domains with practical retro kitchen complemented by formal lounge and north facing rear garden. Large size bedrooms (2nd Bedroom retains fireplace), a central bathroom, large laundry, second toilet and side street garage adds further appeal to this superb locale. Enhanced by polished floorboards, high ceilings, timber fretwork, ducted heating, air conditioning and storage shed, it's immediately comfortable with exciting future prospects for a variety of buyers. Steeped in convenience ideally in close range to amenities including everything from Coburg Market to popular cafes, restaurants, public transport services, local schools, Merri Creek Trail parkland and the buzz of Sydney Road. Underscoring the appeal of locality, the residence is south of Bell Street and only a few kilometres to the CBD.
Insights: 57 Harding Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Make me yours
Ready to welcome a new family, this three bedroom Californian Bungalow style home in a tree lined street combines comfort with luxurious stone expanses and plentiful outdoor space. Presenting a living room with gas log fire in granite surrounds, spacious kitchen/dining, abundant paved outdoor entertaining space and a studio, it's on the market for the first time in over 30 years. In the kitchen a stainless steel stove features a gas cooktop and fan forced electric oven, matched with granite countertops. Three double bedrooms include BIRs, the bathroom is central and further features include cooling, high ceilings, leadlight, a big auto garage, side driveway and land size of approximately 458m2. A stroll to schools, transport and playgrounds it's also near Coburg Market and Sydney Road.
Insights: 83 Phillips Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Renovators Delight!
In one of Coburg's best pockets lies this renovators delight, potentially packed and ready for its next chapter. This home is perfect for the first-timer or experienced hand to craft the next gem on the street.
On a generous allotment of 495sqm (approx.). The house itself features two bedrooms, master bedroom with a walk-in wardrobe and a split system. Serviced by the generous size original central bathroom with a bath tub. Flooded with natural light this well-equipped kitchen offers an abundance of cupboard/bench space, perfect for any aspiring master-chef. With a separate dining and living area, family and meal times or a quiet night in, either way you will enjoy calling this place home.
Other features of this character filled home include separate toilet, ample parking, separate laundry, large garage and a self contained unit at the rear. Perfect for living in whilst you renovate the front or perhaps a teenager's retreat.
In a first-class location, this home is within walking distance to the vibrant Sydney Road which gives you access to all the cafes, restaurants, boutiques that are on offer and providing easy access to public transport such as the number 19 Tram.

Description:
Spectacular New Inner-Urban Family Luxury
In a prized location with instant access to the best of Coburg, this fully-optioned home has been designed to deliver the ultimate environment of easy-living luxury with its impressive space, design versatility and premium features throughout. Quality at every turn, the home's opulent interior comprises four generous bedrooms (all with mirrored robes), two luxurious ensuites and two additional bathrooms - all with stone-top vanities and floor-to-ceiling tiles. Add to this a spacious open-plan living/dining area enhanced by a chef's kitchen complete with stone benchtops and splashbacks, ample cupboard space, Smeg cooking appliances and dishwasher. Other premium features include zoned ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, comprehensive security system (alarm, video intercom and CCTV), ducted vacuum, soft-close cabinetry, double-glazed windows and American Oak solid timber floors. Stacker doors (from the living area) reveal a sunny rear courtyard with Blackbutt entertaining deck, synthetic turf and permitter gardens, plus an internally-accessed garage via gated driveway (both remote-controlled). South of Bell Street with the best of Coburg is at your fingertips, it's walking distance to trains and trams, shops and supermarkets, cool cafes and restaurants, as well as easy access to local parks and schools.
Insights: 64a Munro Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
The charm of yesteryear
Untouched, and oozing potential, take in the yesteryear charm of this double fronted period weatherboard, set in what is quickly becoming Coburg's finest pocket to live, and experience all the trappings that the 3058 postcode has to offer.
Set on an impressive corner site, with north facing rear yard and bordering May Street, the land size is surprisingly expansive, which is a wonderful balance to an already enticing home ready for the next phase of its life.
With a floorplan consisting of hallway, three bedrooms, loungeroom, through to rear kitchen/meals area and bathroom, the cosy /intimate feel is warm and inviting, allowing the future home buyer to update and renovate (STCA) to their liking, using the spacious rear to your advantage.
Your own established private garden adventure awaits with an array of choice to suit, along with side entrance off May Street.
All this, included within proximity to Coburg North Primary, Batman Train Station, Merri Creek reserve and track, and Gaffney Street Shopping, it's all here.
Insights: 74 Ohea Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Charm, potential and lifestyle
Perfect placement permits quick pedestrian access to Moreland railway station, Upfield Bike Path, Nicholson Street tram plus Sydney Road shops and cafes from this two bedroom charmer. Free flowing living spaces comprise a central lounge with rustic open fireplace, kitchen/meals and rear sunroom. Stone counters, 900mm freestanding oven and rangehood plus dishwasher define the updated kitchen and there's also a covered outdoor entertaining area, separate laundry, polished floorboards, hydronic heating, air conditioning and a generous backyard. A superb entry point into a highly sought locale, it will suit investors and starters while downsizers and renovators looking to further modernise will enjoy the challenge.

Description:
Period & Style!
Graced with alluring period character, this charming four-bedroom Californian Bungalow is accentuated by impressive dimensions that is bound to appeal to the discerning buyer seeking a quality family home. Boasting high ceilings and period features throughout this property is perfect to live in now.
The large timber kitchen area is truly the heart of the home featuring stainless steel appliances, tiled splash back, stone bench tops and plenty of cupboard/bench space. Bathed in natural light, the beautiful dining and living area complete this open plan space, which also includes split system heating and cooling. Opening out onto your own private covered decking area overlooking the large rear yard.
A spacious master bedroom comprises of a bay window and plenty of natural light. All three other bedrooms are serviced by an original stunning bathroom with a claw foot tub and a separate shower. Complementing this family home is separate laundry, ducted heating, single carport and plenty of off street parking.
Positioned in the heart of Coburg, located close to Coburg North Primary School, Coburg Train Station, public transport, cafes, park plus so much more!
You will fall in love with every little detail of this property.

Description:
Focus On Lifestyle - Forthcoming Auction
Step inside and fall in love: opening into a spacious living/dining/kitchen flaunting a wide balcony with leafy views of Merri Creek Parklands, this elegant, naturally bright, serenely situated and secure two bedroom, two bathroom apartment shines. Entertaining will be a pleasure as there’s space both inside and out, and the fully equipped kitchen has everything you need, encompassing a fan forced oven, electric cooktop, dishwasher, breakfast bar, pantry, cupboards and counter space. Peaceful double bedrooms include one with a wide built-in robe and the particularly generous main sleeping quarters, which boasts its own balcony, walk-in robe and ensuite. Centrally positioned, the main bathroom includes a bath, and there’s also a separate laundry. The well kept complex is secured by electric gates and pedestrian entrances with video intercom, plus the abode benefits from heating, cooling, elevator access, secure covered parking and storage. Access to the residents’ swimming pool and barbecue area promises a fun and social lifestyle and with scenic Merri Creek so close, schools nearby, transport and Coburg Lake just a stroll, plus lively Sydney Road within easy reach, convenience is high and so are the opportunities to make the most of each day.
Features
- Bright open plan design flaunting leafy views and incorporating two balconies
- Beautifully presented, starring generous open living, dining and fully equipped kitchen
- Two double bedrooms: spacious main sleeping quarters offers walk-in robe and ensuite
- Second bathroom, laundry, heating, cooling and security including video intercom
- Covered parking, with storage, and access to residents’ pool and barbecue area
- Seconds to Merri Creek it’s a stroll to transport and near schools and Sydney Road
Insights: 301a/1 Manna Gum Court, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 73 other 2 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Shape The Future - Great Development
A bright northerly rear aspect, rear right of way and considerable land of approximately 480m2 ensure that after more than 30 years in the same hands this double fronted, three bedroom home presents a very enticing opportunity for the astute buyer. So whether you develop two side-by-side homes or keep as an investment, you are sure to make money. In a spot close to everything, the residence offers a central lounge room, kitchen/meals and three sizeable bedrooms, plus an outdoor entertaining area and huge rear lawn, and the greatest appeal lies in the opportunities to try something new with the substantial block (subject to council approval). Envision a bright future and bring it to life in this well serviced locale: trains, buses, trams, schools, Coburg Market and Sydney Road are close by and CityLink access a short drive.
Agent: Ray White Coburg
Insights: 174 Bell Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Bright & Spacious!
A superb opportunity in a prime Coburg East location.
Charming features throughout this older style weatherboard home offers room for the entire family to enjoy with 3 bedrooms, huge bathroom with separate shower and claw bath, spacious lounge, laundry, 2 W.C's and a large open-plan kitchen / meals area leading out to a sunny rear yard.
With room for improvement, this home offers an abundance of opportunities (S.T.C.A) to take advantage of, not to mention it's central location - close to Sydney Road & Nicholson Street trams, cafes, restaurants and the Merri Creek Trail.
Inspection By Appointment - Enquire Today!
NB. Regarding indicated Price - Please understand, particularly on the more 'popular' properties or in a 'hot' property market that more than one buyer may be interested in the same property. When that happens, all buyers will be given EQUAL OPPORTUNITY TO MAKE THEIR BEST OFFERS.
Pre 'Jims Building Inspection' available to purchase at - https://reports.jimsbuildinginspections.com.au/building-inspection-report/building-inspection-report-for-22-hardwick-st-coburg-vic-3058-australia/

Description:
Extra-Wide Frontage, Extra Potential!
With LAND dimensions of 20.12m x 39.62m (approx.), this 797sqm (approx.) offers a very exciting opportunity!
This brick veneer's home current floor plan includes; 4 bedrooms, separate lounge, spacious kitchen/meals. Bathroom with bath, 2 x toilets, separate laundry. Side drive to large lock up garage. Huge backyard ready for a veggie patch!
In a fantastic location within Strathmore School Zone & Coburg West Primary nearly at end of street. Easy access to transport & approx. 9km to CBD.
This large parcel of land offers development potential (STCA) or just enjoy the extra space.
Here's your chance!

Description:
Contemporary Charm
A testament to quality and style, this character weatherboard emanates high-calibre class. Period décor and modern elements offset the layout to perfection which takes into consideration the need for entertaining as well as reclining. Striking in appearance and functionality, the kitchen is well-equipped and easily services the open-plan family and meals area. A living room (with gas heater) provides for more intimate occasions while a covered deck is perfect for outdoor get-togethers. Excellent family zoning places the luxuriant bedrooms at the front of the home alongside a family bathroom. An additional bathroom is situated at the rear, well-placed for guests. As one would expect from a home of this standard, polished floorboards, split system heating/cooling, solar panels, an attic and a remote garage accessible from the rear lane round out the features list. Adding to the home’s incredible appeal, the superb locale places you close to Coburg West Primary School, Strathmore Secondary College, public transport and shops.
Insights: 34 Bruce Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.
